case.state: I dunno, I came here to find some living partners... Maybe if we can arrange a three-way...
I'm not the ghost of Christmas future. I'm the ghost of mortals yet to cum.
This is actually my Halloween costume, but red is Christmasy enough to make it still work, right?
I'll never pass up an opportunity to wear my favorite Halloween costume.
Broken heart? I have just the cure for you.
I have just the cure for anything that ails you.
I may not be an actual nurse, but I know the cure for every kind of illness.
I... am Spooky. You mortals are playing strip poker? I guess that game never gets old.
Hey. Does your game need a ghost in it? Of course it does. That's what I'm here for.

Allow me to show you why dating a ghost is objectively the best option.
Don't worry, this doesn't count as necrophilia. It's actually spectrophilia. Nothing morally objectionable in that.
Wait, me? How's that possible?
Me?... Is that really what I look like...?

Is that me? Did I just discover a new ability of mine?

You're a researcher, huh? I could use more of those.
Huh. People aren't usually so happy to see ghosts. It's... kind of nice.
Geez, are trying to wake the dead?
Oh no, it's her.
Oh yeah? And what's so edgy about that?

Ooh, a living statue. Closest thing to that I have in my mansion is a man-sized puppet.
I'd... rather not talk about how I died...
Ha! This'll be easy. You mortals are so moronic, ~other~ couldn't even get dressed right!
You've got a lot of guts showing up here naked, ~other~. I like that.
Hmm. Overconfident, perverted, or simply stupid. One of those must be the reason you showed up already naked, ~other~.
Huh. This place is nice, I guess, but I prefer my own mansion.
This is a nice mansion, I suppose, but I'd bet mine is bigger.
This is a nice place, I guess, but my mansion's better. It's got all kinds of different themed rooms. I think there's even a restaurant in there somewhere...
Ouh, geez, the sun is so bright...
Ouh, geez, the sun is so bright. It hurts my... ghost eyes.
Have fun with sand in your clothes, mortals. I'll be here... adjusting to how bright it is... Guh...
Have fun getting sun-burnt, mortals. I'll be here, completely fine... Damn, I should've brought sunglassess...
Ooh, I'm going to have fun watching you mortals embarrass yourselves in front of all these people.
Ah! Shoot! Ghosts aren't supposed to be seen by a lot of people at once!
Ooh, instruments of death. I might take one of those home...
Hey, just a heads-up, if one of those weapons starts floating, that's not me. My reach is as normal as yours.
Wow, this place is pretty gross. Good thing I'm completely unaffected by it.
This place is pretty gross, huh? Good thing I'm floating, incorporeal, and have no sense of smell.
Oh, gee, is that broken glass? Have fun with that, mortals.
Wow, stripping in a dark, dirty alley? You mortals are so depraved.
All the broken glass reminds me of home... What? Oh, nothing.
Before you ask, no, I do not know any of the ghosts here.
Before you ask, no, I do not live here. I live in a nice mansion on a hill.
These arcade machines are fine enough, but I prefer my custom ones. Much more fun.
Geez, just how old is this arcade? Blood Fighter 1? Top Hunter X? Expert Man 2? Do you even know how many Expert Man games there are?
You know one perk of being a ghost? You can play any arcade game you want for free. It's really easy to trick them into thinking you put a coin in.
Oh. Great. I can't wait to not have a bath at all because I'm a ghost. Fun.
Hope you weren't expecting some hot and wild ghost action, because spoilers, I can't get wet. Not with regular water, anyway.
Well... I can't take a bath, but I can pretend, if you want me to. I can't get wet, but I can still get naked.
Did you know that running water makes ghosts more powerful? People think that's limited to rivers and streams, but nope, sinks and baths too.
I may not be able to shower, but at least all this running water makes me more powerful. Oh? Did you think that meant rivers and streams? Nope. Plumbing too.
Hope you weren't expecting some hot and wild ghost action, because spoilers, I can't get wet. Not with regular water, anyway.
I'm the only woman here, huh? This is going to be a fun match.
I'm the only woman here, huh? How fortunate.
Oh. I was hoping there would be some men playing. Oh well. Ghosts don't have room to be picky.
Oh. I was hoping there would be some men playing. Oh well. I've learned to make do without them.
I... am Spooky. And you are...?
The name is Spooky. Spooky. There is only one P. Got it?
Hello. I... am Spooky. That is my name, and I am also quite frightening.
My name is Spooky. And before you ask, no, I am not haunting this place. My usual place is much... nicer than this.
My name... is Spooky. Before you ask, no, I am not tied to this place. I can go other places too, if you catch my drift.
I... am Spooky, and I'm here to teach you a thing or two about how sexy ghosts can be.
You can have this one back.
Take this one back.
Give me one.
Ahaha. Nothing for me. This hand is already excellent.
No cards for me. I'm dead, not stupid.
You know what? I'll take ~cards.text~.
Hey, you can have these ~cards.text~.
You can take these ~cards.text~ cards back.
Take these ~cards.text~ back, foolish dealer.
I'll take, uh... ~cards.text~, I guess.
I will alleviate the pressure by cutting these ~cards.text~ out of me... Er, I mean my hand.
Well, at least one ghost here is doing decently.
You're going to have to wait a bit longer to see one more naked ghost.
All according to plan.
Hey, these are pretty sweet.

Good luck beating me this round, mortals.
Oh, would you look at that. I got something really good.
See? You'll never get a look at my ghostly mysteries.
Ever wonder what a naked ghost looks like? Well, keep wondering.
Ah, the sweet comfort of assured safety.
You'll have to wait a bit longer to see my ghost boobs... Well, see them again...
Thought you had me beat? You should know that ghosts just don't stop.
Yeah! Now it's one of you guys' turn to show what you're made of.
Oh no, so sad, looks like you'll just have to wait yet another round to see some ghostly bits.
Ever wonder what a naked ghost looks like? Too bad, you won't be finding out this round.
Hah! No ghost bits for you this time!
Oh gee, look at that. A good hand. That's too bad. I'm just dying to take these panties off.
Gosh, these panties sure are comfortable. I'm glad I'll be keeping them for another round.
I bet you wish you could see me fully naked again, huh? Too bad.
Ever wonder what a naked ghost looks like? Well, me too actually. I don't show up in mirrors...
Hah! Suck it, mortals! Oh wait, you can't, because "it" is staying covered!
Hah! It's gonna be one of you showing your flesh this time.
Guess who's going to be haunting you a little bit longer?
Oh. Would you look at that. I'm staying another round.
Oh yeah. Is this what you want? You want me to rub my tender bits? Too bad. I'm not losing this round.
Oh my god... This hand... is great.
And you thought you could win.
Aw, too bad. I was going to teach you about ghost anatomy, but this hand means I'll be keeping my dress on. How horribly unlucky.
Did I mention I'm not wearing anything under my dress? Although I guess that doesn't matter, seeing as how I have a great hand right now.
Huh? Well, these will have to do.
Well this could be better.
This should be enough.
Hmm. Okay then.
A pair's not bad, right?
This'll... yeah, this will be fine.
This performance is barely acceptable... but I'll allow it.
There's always someone who's doing worse than you.
Well... At least it's an actual hand.
Eh, this'll do.
These are kinda meh.
These... these aren't great.
Oh. This can't be good. Or maybe it can.
Like a slaughterhouse soaked in blood and betrayal, I'll have to settle for these.
Well, these should be enough.
As good as can be expected.
Oh... Well, a pair should be enough.
I have more faith in Specimen 1 than I have in this hand right now. They're equally flimsy, too.
This... could be enough? Fifty years of undeath and never once did I study statistics...
Okay. This is still going according to plan.
This has to be enough.
A pair, huh?... Sure. This could work.
Is this what you want? You want me to touch myself? Well, you might just get your wish, or you might not. It's hard to say...
What? You think I'm afraid to lose this game? Why would I be afraid to do something I do every night?... Probably shouldn't have admitted that...
Well... At least I won't be the first naked ghost here...
I suppose there's not much of a point holding out...
... Don't let our performance here fool you. Ghosts are quite capable.
Are you kidding? I got junk right away?
Well, fine, I guess it's about time I join in on the fun.
Good news for you, mortals, it seems I'll be joining in on your fun this round.
Well... I can't say right now would be a bad time to lose...
Are my breasts not enough for you, ~other~? Well luckly for you, my hand is junk...
Looks like I'm about to give you a bit more motivation, ~other~...
I suppose losing my panties wouldn't mean much right now...
It seems I'm about to lose my position of power here... whatever little I had, being the last one covered...
This... sure does pose a problem, if I plan on teasing some more...
You know what? Let's just pretend this isn't my hand.
This is... not great. Well, I'm used to things not always going exactly to plan...
This is... unfortunate, but only a minor setback...
I'm the one who's supposed to be tormenting people here. Stupid cards...
This isn't great... Wait, if I lose I'll have to... Ugh, I'm not done teasing yet...
Come on. I can't do anything with these cards...
No amount of playing god will fix this hand.
Stupid cards, you're supposed to be tormenting the mortals.
At this rate, I'll have to show some skin. Er, ectoplasm. Whatever.
Oh, you want to see a naked ghost, huh? Well, you might just get your wish...
I shouldn't be losing. Maybe you guys'll have something worse...?
Stupid cards. Stop ruining my plans.
Luck does not seem to appreciate what I'm trying to do here...
Okay. Fine. If I have to show my boobs again, I'll show my boobs again. Who needs delayed gratification anyway?
Luck isn't satisfied with just my breasts, it wants me to take it all off. Well luck can cool its jets.
Figures the one time I'm trying to keep my panties on...
I'd kill for a better hand... Well, I'd kill for a lot of things...
Oh come on.
These cards want me to lose my panties? Fine, I'll take them off. Gladly, even! Being naked is freeing!
It can't get any worse, can it? Of course it can always get worse...
If you guys are rigging this game, I'll find out. You can't hide anything from a ghost.
How many souls do I have to sacrifice to stay in this?
Well... You can't say I didn't try...
The end is nigh... My end, anyway...
I'll resist the urge to apparate more clothes...
Look, I'm not afraid to lose. I'm just competitive, okay?
My name is Spooky, by the way -- and I don't mean it's frightening, I mean it's the word "Spooky."
Well, I would say "you don't have to choose," but if you're implying what I think you're implying, you can forget that.
Oh well. Not everything you research needs to be nefarious. Sometimes you just need to... research arcade cabinets, or whatever.
Oh, you're alive. Great.
She's alive... Cool.
You can hide, but you can't run.
Hide all you want. It won't change the fact that you're naked.
You won't hear me complaining, Croix.
Sure. Give me the strongest thing you have.
Hang on... Your clothes are alive. Are you wearing a clothing monster, or did you make clothes out of a monster?
I don't need the knife, I just wanted it.
I'll pass. There's plenty of ruins under my mansion. They get pretty dull after a couple decades.
Depends. Do monster origin stories count?
Hmm... I guess I'd have to say I admire Genghis Khan. He was a... an interesting leader.
Hmm... Nothing in particular, but I always enjoy seeing ancient statues of naked people.
Oh, you can move while we're looking at you. Well... good, I guess...
Of course I'm not. I am my own ghost. Nobody owns me.
Stand? User? What are you talking about? No one's using me. I'm the boss.
Whatever. I'm still not afraid of you.
That's pretty neat. Did you know ghosts can do the same thing?
Well, uh... the knife gives me a bit of comfort, I guess...
... Does it feel sexy? What kind of a question is that? Yeah, I can phase through people, but it's not sexy.
I died from asking the wrong questions. You catch my drift?
Yes, it's possible. Wanna see how? ~player~, help me demonstrate.
Ducks...? You could probably fit a few more lil guys in there than that.
Considering I'm neither alive nor in need of food, I think I can say I don't.
Yeah well, you're a box, so I think I win.
Cardboard can't die. Just ask Specimen 1.
Hmm, I don't think I've seen any artists recently. Then again, most of the people I've seen recently are dead.
You know, you might think that being dead makes me closer to that answer, but nope. I don't understand it either.
Oh, I have plenty of critics. They all say what I do is evil, immoral, wrong, and I just... well I ignore them.
I've seen stranger things than that happen. I'm sure you can cum.
Oh, I didn't even read your description.
I've got plenty of art hanging around my mansion, so an art gallery isn't exactly my idea of "fun."
I like to sit back and watch a good show.
I couldn't go without security monitoring systems -- cameras, moniters, and stuff. I like to keep an eye on... things.
The other moving statues I know are, uh... shy, so they only move when they're not being looked at. Some of them are fast enough to move when their watcher is blinking.
Hmm... I'd have to say I'd... kill you, screw ~player~, and... kill you again.
If I'm a hologram, what's that make you? A cardboard cutout?
You can "create" ghosts? That's not how that works. Surely you must be summoning them instead, unless they're not ghosts but spirits.
A blindfold, huh...? I don't know if that makes it harder or easier to scare you.
A blindfold, huh...? I guess I'm going to have to get creative with my scare tactics.
A blindfold, huh...? I hope you're not used to sudden loud noises, then...
Knife to meet you, Alice!
A hologram, huh? That's pretty much the same thing as a ghost, so you're fine by me.
Yeah, well, whether you believe it or not, I am a ghost.
Oh, I see how it is. You think you can exorcise me, huh? Well too bad, because that won't work.
Is that a cop?
Well, when you're immortal, you have a lot of time to waste.
A cat girl, huh? You look like you belong in my mansion -- but early on, before any of the actually scary stuff.
Ugh, a love fairy? Couldn't we have gotten a fear fairy instead, or something...?
A vampire, huh...? I suppose that's undead enough. You're fine by me.
Huh. Come to think of it, I don't have a succubus in my mansion. Why don't you come over some time, Morrigan?
Say, Rinkah, aren't you an Oni or something?
What's up with your arms? Are you some kind of lab experiment?
What? You know, a boobjob? It's like a handjob, but with your boobs?
You don't need your hands for all of them. That's why handjobs are called handjobs, and the other ones are named after the body part you use.
Yeah, well, whatever the case, we both brought weapons to stab people with. You like being alive, and I like hurting people. We're not so different.
Oh, you know, the average amount of knifes... like, thirty or so.
Look, a dead woman's gotta have her hobbies, okay?
Didn't you see me holding a knife? My ghost army would be like a regular army, except you can't kill them. Even if you're not afraid of ghosts, everyone is afraid of getting shot.
Okay, first of all, skeletons are not like ghosts. Not even close. Second, I can eat fries, I just haven't had them in a long time because I can't go out and buy them.
Oh, he was a, um... powerful leader, who founded an empire through... unity.
Oh, well I wouldn't say they're all that historically important, so... never mind.
I don't know how they got there, but you're free to research them as much as you want. Just be ready to spend a lot of time there.

Marble, brass, wood, I don't care what they're made of, as long as they're naked. People think mortals got hornier as time went on, but they've always been horny, and those statues are proof. They're basically ancient porn.
Not really, no, but it has given me a lot of time to research answers we do or can know.
Livelihood? You get paid?
Eh, if I wanted to talk to a robot, I could do that at home too.
Yeah, totally. I can't believe you've never heard of him.
Good, good. You're welcome to come over any time. My door is always... open... Huh. What a funny expression...
That's a shame... Well, if that happens to you, there's always room in my mansion. No critics there.
Oh, you know, living dolls, puppets, otter-shaped entertainment droids. The usual stuff.
I recently started reading some of Stephen King's work. I find it... oddly relatable.
An AI, huh? I wonder how far your programing can reach...
An AI, huh? Know how to hack anything?
That's the kind of stup-- I mean courage I... admire in a... person.
At this point in my existence everything is a fetish.
Healing? Damage? What're you talking about? They're clothes. Besides, you couldn't hit me if you tried.
Psh, yeah, like I have any friends...
I'm still not afraid of you, Chara. Any ghost that gets killed by a mortal clearly wasn't using their full potential.
Mortal, immortal, whatever. Point is, you're not a ghost, so you can't hit me.
Why would I know? What, do I run a franchise of haunted houses or something? I only haunt the one mansion... And I'm not that old! I died in the 60's!
Well... Alright. It's not like I don't have room for guests...

condition.saying: Hey, Spooky! Since you have an army of ghosts and stuff, how'd you like to join my army? I got ghosts, too. A whole legion of 'em!

case.state: What sense would that make? I bow to no one, turtle girl.

condition.saying: I thought only noble, blue-blooded Boos could get their own haunted mansions and private armies. How did a human ghost your age get your own?

case.state: First of all, what makes you think these "Boo" traditions apply to humans? Second, I inherited it.
Oh yeah, I've got... pets. Like... an otter named Otto, and... a deer named Tirsiak. Tirsiak doesn't like guests, but Otto is very... friendly. He likes to give guests big hugs.
No, I don't have many housemates who like card games, and I don't get out of the house enough to play with others...
Ugh, you just had to bring fries...? I miss those...
You're a shapeshifter, you say? I have specimen that can change forms, but only fixed progression, not total freedom of form...
I'm just going to warn you now so that you don't waste film or whatever: I don't show up in pictures or videos.
Can we speed this game along? I've got mortals to torment.
You mortals sure do make this game drag on. Good thing I'm immortal and can play this literally forever.
Can we speed this game along? I've got experiments to curate.
Okay, I know I've said stuff about how much time I have, but that didn't mean I wanted this game to take forever.
Can we speed this game along? I have experiments to run, and research to be done, and stuff. On the ones who're still alive, anyway...
Can finish this game sometime before we're all ghosts?
So... What are your greatest fears? Mine is, uh... heights. Yeah...
So... What are your greatest fears? Mine is, uh... birds. Yeah...
So... What are your greatest fears? Mine is, uh... cacti. No, seriously.
And then there were two.
Just one mortal stands between me and my victory now.
It's just us now. How about you do me a favor and give up?
It's just us now. Why don't you save us some time and give up?
It's just us now. Nervous yet?
It's down to the two of us. Maybe now you'll actually see something from me?
It's just us now, and I still haven't lost yet. Nervous yet?
Would you look at that. It's down to you and me, and I haven't lost at all yet. Are you nervous?
It's just you and me now. Scared? You should be. I haven't lost yet.
It's just you and me now. Ooh, is this what you want? Why don't you give in to your carnal desires and throw the game for me?
Well, it's just you and me now. Why don't we just forget about the game and have some fun together instead? That way, we're both "winners."
... I'm just going to put it out there: I'm looking for someone to come home with me. I'm accepting any and all takers.
Oh, and ghosts are good at handling break-ups, so don't worry about being "trapped" in a relationship with one when you die. Forever is a long time.
So there. Now you know how ghosts' clothes work. They're basically imaginary.
Well... now you you know how ghosts' clothes work. They're a part of our bodies... except not really. They're not their own objects, but we can take them off.
So uh... Yeah. I don't wear underwear. I can, but I don't... usually. At least now you know how ghosts' clothes work. They're just apparitions.
Seriously, I hope you mortals are wearing sun block. The sun is more likely to kill you than a shark is.
If anyone plans to go swimming, I can assure you that you don't have to worry about sharks. You're more likely to die from hot tap water than you are to a shark.
If I were mortal like you, I'd be less worried about if this beach has sharks and more worried if this beach has any vending machines. One of them is likely to kill you, and the other is a shark.
Hey, uh, shark attacks are unlikely, but if you do get attacked by one, go for the eyes, not the nose. It's much harder to punch underwater than you may think.
You know, if you dated me, you'd never have to meet my parents. They're already dead -- and they didn't become ghosts.
"Til death do us part" isn't a thing with ghosts. I'll never die, and when you do, you'll just be a ghost too. We could stay together forever, if you wanted.
I'm not monogamous, by the way. You wanna date me and someone else? That's cool by me, as long as I get my fair share of attention.
Since I can phase through walls, I can get into things for free, so if we went on a date, you'd only have to pay for yourself.
You can't get ghosts pregnant. Just putting that out there...
Have you ever had a souljob before? It's exactly what it sounds like.
You may have thought about dating other types of monsters before, but you might not realize that ghosts are the best type. Allow me to change your mind.
I don't know which of you, if anyone, may be considering dating a supernatural being, but allow me to tell you why ghosts are the best choice. I can think of several reasons right off the bat...
Uh, by the way, any kinds of... unsavory rumors you may have heard about me and my mansion are not true.
People who spend a night in my mansion don't automatically die by morning. I have plenty of... living guests in my mansion.
Contrary to rumors, it is possible to leave my mansion. You won't be trapped. Anyone who visited that was never seen again just... got lost on the way back.
I probably don't even need to say this, but I don't actually eat babies. I have no idea how that rumor got started...
You won't die immediately if I try to touch you, just to be clear. If only it were that easy...
I will admit, my mansion is rather dirty. Its size makes it difficult to keep clean. I hope you won't mind some, uh... cobwebs.
Probably the dumbest rumor I've heard is that spam calls originate from my mansion. I mean, come on, why would I waste my time with that nonsense?
Vampires suck your blood, but ghosts suck your... Well, whatever you want them to.
A lot of vampires have hypnosis powers, if you didn't know. You may think you're attracted to one, but they're just using you.
You know, a lot of vampires don't brush their teeth. If you date one, you'll have to get used to the taste of blood in their kisses.
Zombies are fine, I guess. If you're into brainless chicks. And horrible body odor.
If you decide to date a zombie, I hope you're into biting. They don't ask if you are, and they bite hard.
Everybody knows not to have sex with succubi, right? They're soul-stealers. The orgasm they'll give you isn't worth your soul, and I can do better for you, anyhow.
By the way, never date a mummy. Their skin is super dry and their bones are brittle. They're disgustingly fragile -- quite literally.
I wouldn't date a werewolf, if I were mortal like you. They're prone to having ticks and fleas. Unless, of course, you want to be covered in small parasites.
You know how dog owners are always finding dog hairs all over their clothes? This is an even bigger problem for people in relationships with werewolves.

You should definitely avoid dating an arachne. Aside from the obvious gross spider half, they're always leaving webs everywhere, and their saliva is poisonous. Not to mention all the little spiders that will be crawling over you in your sleep.

Gorgons are obviously bad dates. Even if you can see past the snake hair and scales, everyone knows they'll turn you to stone. You'd have to take "blind date" very literally... for the entire length of your relationship.
Slimes may seem like a fun date at first due to their maliable nature, but they're actually pretty acidic. Not to mention their lack of solid... equipment.
Do I even need to tell you why dating a skeleton wouldn't work out? Because I won't. You should already know.
Seriously, I can't overstate how freeing it is floating around naked. You should definitely give it a try when you die.

It's odd how mortals are often more afraid of things with lower chances of killing them than the things they do every day. Like how most people are more afraid of riding in a plane than they are riding in a car.
Remember, fear often comes from a lack of understanding. If you're scared of something, research it. You never know how wrong your instinct can be.
Honestly, having a mansion isn't as great as it's made out to be. There are lots of rooms in my mansion I never go into simply because there's so many of them.
Did you know that some cultures believe that swearing and feigned anger repells ghosts? It doesn't, and actually, I just find it hilarious.
Just to save you a bit of trouble, no method that claims to get rid of ghosts actually works. Exorcisms, cleansings, and all that other junk? Completely false.
I will admit, I do have... non-living guests too. I mean, I'm a ghost, I'd obviously have other undead folk living with me, right? They're not as bad as people make them out to be.
Anyone know any good places to eat around here?... What? I can eat.
Some do, some don't. It varies from spirit to spirit.
My mansion has room for all guests. What sort of role do you plan on filling?
I... don't actually know. I've never tried to get rid of a ghost. I guess you'd have to find an exorcist or something.
It's, uh... pretty complicated, actually. Let's not linger on that question.
Ha! I'd like to see you try to be me in a fight.
If you're itching for a fight, Ann, you should come over to my mansion. You won't be disappointed.
I'm not a shadow, I'm a ghost. There's a big difference, I'm sure.
I'm not a shadow, I'm a ghost. There's a big difference. Probably.
What? You don't have ghosts at every match? That's discriminatory.
What? You don't have ghosts at every match? That's racist.
Yeah, it must not be normal for you to get invited to play strip poker, huh?
I remember not being taken any more seriously than I am now. That's about it.
You don't say...
Yeah, the scientific explanation is that ghosts are real, and you need to accept that.
Yeah, the scientific explanation is that ghosts are real. Deal with it.
Fake cyst? No, I'm a real, genuine ghost.
Yeah, totally just a costume, and wires, and special lighting to make me look transparent.
You're not dead, Revy. At least, not yet.
Who? No, I am my own doing.
What? No. No one tells Spooky what to do.
Nope. Genuine restless spirit, right here.
Nope. I'm a 100% genuine dead girl.
Like a ghost is any less believable than... whatever you are.
How can this be a costume when I'm floating and transparent?
Yeah, well, the feeling's mutual, Elaine.
Yeah, well, I'm not exactly fond of mortals, so we're even.
Only some people. Everyone you ever knew? Yeah, they're not ghosts, they're gone forever.
Only some people. Your friends and ancestors are likely gone forever, never to be seen again.
That's not how ghosts work. You have to die a tragic death, or be vengeful, or something.
I don't, normally. I just che-- er, felt it was appropriate for this game.
Yes. My name is Spooky - with one "P."
I am not cute! I'm terrifying!
Oh, you know, normal stuff. Researching biosciences to create the most horrifying and vicious creatures possible.
Hologram? No, I'm a real ghost!
